item.title: Just a little somthing
item.dc:creator: @ExLinX ExLinX
item.description:
@ExLinX wrote:

when adding your background use this

<style> body { background-image: url("http://koolio.files.wordpress.com/2007/02/img24.jpg"); background-position: 50% 50%; background-repeat: no-repeat; } </style>
it will stop your background from repeating its self
example: exerex.awardspace.com

Read full topic
